row.process:
! Create a PSCredential Object containing the username and password --- : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = &UC4RB_WRM_PASSWORD# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD $secPwd = ConvertTo-SecureString "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" -AsPlainText -Force
: SET &INPUT_TEMP#=&UC4RB_WRM_USERNAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &INPUT_TEMP# $credential=New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential("&INPUT_TEMP#", $secPwd)
! Create PS SessionOptions : SET &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET# = "" : IF &UC4RB_WRM_OPTIONS# <> "" ! Skip CA Check : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_WRM_OPTIONS#,"Skip CA Check") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET#, " -SkipCACheck") : ENDIF ! Skip CN Check : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_WRM_OPTIONS#,"Skip CN Check") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET#, " -SkipCNCheck") : ENDIF ! Use SSL : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_WRM_OPTIONS#,"Use SSL") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET#, " -UseSSL") : ENDIF : ENDIF ! Connection Timeout : SET &CONN_TIMEOUT# = MULT(&UC4RB_WRM_CONN_TIMEOUT#, 1000) : SET &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET#, " -OpenTimeout &CONN_TIMEOUT#")
: P "Advance session option commandlet: &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET#" $sessionOption = New-PSSessionOption &UC4RB_WRM_PSO_CMDLET#
! Create PS Session : SET &UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET# = "" ! Host name : SET &INPUT_TEMP#=&UC4RB_WRM_HOST# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@POWERSHELL &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &INPUT_TEMP# : SET &UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET#, ' -ComputerName "&INPUT_TEMP#"')
! Port : IF &UC4RB_WRM_PORT# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET#, ' -Port "&UC4RB_WRM_PORT#"') : ENDIF
! Authentication Type : IF &UC4RB_WRM_AUTH_TYPE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET#, " -Authentication &UC4RB_WRM_AUTH_TYPE# ") : ENDIF
: P "Creation session commandlet: &UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET# using sessionoption and credentials" $UC4RB_WINRM_PSSESSION = New-PSSession &UC4RB_WRM_SESSION_CMDLET# -SessionOption $sessionOption -credential $credential
if(!$UC4RB_WINRM_PSSESSION){ Write-output "ERROR: Unable to create PS Session to remote Host" __uc_return( 1 ) } else { Write-output "INFO: Session has been successfully created with target host." }
